name: Insense Time! 4: The Snow Tundra Demo
name_original: Insense Time! 4: The Snow Tundra Demo
description:
Red Dog was fighting Evil Cat when The Airship had seemed to crash land into a snowy biome.  All he could really do was explore so he could get out of the awfully cold tempratures. This game is not finished so levels aren't fully completed yet. THIS IS A DEMO.

CONTROLS

PC: WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

CONTROLLER SUPPORT IS CURRENTLY GLITCHED AT THE MOMENT, DO NOT CONNECT TO CONTROLLER.

Xbox Controller: Left Thumbstick to Move and Jump, Right Thumbstick to use cursor, LT and RT to Click, LB and RB to Press Space

Joy-Cons: Left Thumbstick to Move and Jump, Right Thumbstick to use cursor, ZL and ZR to Click, L and R to Press Space

More Controller Options will be tested...
